questions.question: What is Web3?
answers: Centralized internet that a few organizations control
An online network that can be easily hacked or manipulated

answers: Scalability - transactions can be quite slow

answers: Payment services may decide to not allow payments for certain types of work
Servers for gig-economy apps could go down and affect worker income

Facebook can censor and delete any account
